Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose system for in vitro coagulation studies
System, Test, Antibodies, β2 - Glycoprotein I (β2 - Gpi)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ACL TOP 970 CL analyzer and HemosIL CL Anti-Cardiolipin IgM and Anti-B2 Glycoprotein-I IgM chemiluminescent immunoassays for detection of antiphospholipid antibodies.
Indications for Use Summary: ACL TOP 970 CL: Fully automated analyzer for in vitro diagnostic use in clinical laboratories. HemosIL CL Anti-Cardiolipin IgM and Anti-B2 Glycoprotein-I IgM: Semi-quantitative detection of respective IgM antibodies in human citrated plasma, aiding in diagnosis of Antiphospholipid Syndrome (APS) for adult patients, used in conjunction with other findings.
